abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Science Centers and
            Directed Research Project is to promote the generation and
            dissemination of scientific knowledge relevant to
            conservation and sustainable development activities in the
            Amazon region. This goal will be pursued through a
            two-pronged strategy: 1) support for a grants program for
            funding research projects on a competitive basis in the
            Amazon region; and 2) strengthening of two established
            research institutions of the Amazon. The project consists of
            two components, a Directed Research component and a Science
            Centers component. The Directed Research component will
            support a grants program to fund research projects evaluated
            and selected on a transparent competitive basis. The Science
            Centers component will: strengthen institutional management;
            support rehabilitation and expansion of research
            infrastructure and equipment; increase human resource
            capacity; disseminate research results; provide technical
            assistance; and support key policy studies and planning.
